name: Akrot's World
description:
Controls

  • Movement - Arrows
  • Jump - C
  • Dash - X
  • Climb - Z
  • Pause - Shift

A platform game in which players control a boy named Akrot as he makes his way out of a dungeon while avoiding various deadly obstacles.

This is my first game ever and it's still under development, so I wanted to share it with you guys.

I'm open for feedback and suggestions.

ps: there is 10 coins..

art by: @o-lobster & @v3x3d
